caption: This photograph features a prominent red sign mounted on a grey pole, displaying the message "NO FISHING ALLOWED VIOLATORS PROSECUTED" in white uppercase letters. Below the sign, there's a number "47" in green on a white background, possibly indicating a location marker or distance. Beneath this, on a misty, seemingly cold day, we can see a bridge structure. A group of individuals, appearing relatively small due to the perspective, are gathered at the foot of the large bridge support. They are near a parked car, interacting or observing the surroundings. In the background, the hint of another structural element of the bridge can be seen, and the environment suggests a spacious, possibly riverine or coastal location. The sky is overcast, contributing to the grey and subdued color tones dominating the scene.
title: At fort tilden army reserve facility on breezy point south of Jamaica bay
